The bus came by, and I got on, that's when it all began.
#Arizona desert-dweller since 1960.
#GratefulDad #LoveIsLove #ArizonaElections #ArtMatters
Enamorado de 🇨🇱 ❤️

I occasionally race cars in parking lots, #autocross. Drive a different vehicle over large obstacles to far away places, #Jeep. Sometimes spend extended time living inside yet another vehicle, #RV. I spend too much time on weekends watching a fast parade #F1 and fast bumper cars #NASCAR. And after a 30 year, we will call hiatus, have been #backpacking again.

I try to get out to a live show whenever I can. Take care of the chief inspector, in profile pic, #dogs. #Phoenix, #Arizona native.

Software engineer of a Certain Age, particularly with low-level and embedded systems, and device drivers. Closet extrovert.

All opinions expressed are solely my own, on my own behalf, and do not necessarily reflect those of my employer (who, as of this writing, is Shell Recharge Solutions, a subsidiary of Shell plc).
